sentences: Pärastlõunal on soe ja päike paistab.
context: Pärastlõunal is an Estonian adverb that means 'in the afternoon' or 'during the afternoon.' It's formed from two parts: 'pärast' meaning 'after' and 'lõuna' meaning 'noon,' so literally it translates to 'after noon.' This word indicates time in the afternoon period, typically after 12 PM but before evening. It can be used to describe when something happens or takes place during this part of the day.
